      • COPY_BYTES_PER_ROW_ALIGNMENT

        public static final int COPY_BYTES_PER_ROW_ALIGNMENT
        Buffer-Texture copies on command encoders have to have the `bytes_per_row` aligned to this number. This doesn't apply to `Queue::write_texture`.
